title: Sarong, 1900–69
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads, cotton
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft patterning
description: Sarong (or skirt) with border of floral diamond stripes on one side (bottom of skirt) and an unpatterned red band at the other (top of skirt). Separated by a field showing an all-over floral diamond pattern in ivory (weft) and red (foundation).

tombstone.epitaph:
Sarong, 1900–69.Medium: silk, metallic threads, cotton
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary weft patterning. Gift of Alan L. Wolfe. 1969-50-3.
